title: Glutton Berserker ~The One That Exceeds The Concept Of Levels~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Ability Steal   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Cautious Protagonist   Conditional Power   Death of Loved Ones   Dense Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Discrimination   Dragons   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Knights   Level System   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Secret Identity   Sentient Objects   Seven Deadly Sins   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Weapons   Weak to Strong
author: Ichinoda Ichiri   Isshiki Ichika   一色一凛
description:
Fate, a gatekeeper who had been working for the castle, leads a troublesome life.

Constant hunger attacks triggered by a power forced upon him at birth. A useless skill, it only serves to make him hungrier; however, unbeknownst to him, it has a concealed ability.

One day, having killed a thief sneaking into the castle, he finally noticed its true power.

A skill that feeds upon the very soul of the subjects he kills, depriving them of all their powers. Finally, his constant hunger had been satiated for the first time.

With just that, the man who had been treated like a pile of trash slowly started raising his head. Having exceeded the concept of levels, he strikes fear with his terror-like strength, earning him the nickname…

The Glutton Berserker>
